publishers
Class MessageFactory

java.lang.Object
  publishers.MessageFactory

public class MessageFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This class creates an object of the helper class that implements the methods of the Message Interface.

Author:
Urvi

Method Summary

          Creates an appropriate MessageImpl object

Method Detail

buildMessage

public static Message buildMessage(java.lang.String user,
                                   java.lang.String sym,
                                   Price prce,
                                   int vlme,
                                   java.lang.String dtls,
                                   Tradable.Side sde,
                                   java.lang.String id)
                            throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                   InvalidVolumeValueException
Creates an appropriate MessageImpl object

Parameters:
user - User name associated with Message to be created.
sym - Stock symbol associated with Message to be created.
prce - Price object associated with Message to be created.
vlme - Volume associated with Message to be created.
dtls - Text description associated with Message to be created.
sde - Side associated with Message to be created.
id - Unique identifier associated with Message to be created.
Returns:
An object of the helper class (delegate) MessageImpl.
Throws:
InvalidArgumentException - if parameters user, sym, dtails or id are null or empty. Or, if parameters prc or sde are null.
InvalidVolumeValueException
